name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Field Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong technical troubleshooting abilities and project management skills essential for delivering high-quality service in the medical technology and robotics sectors. I am adept at preventive maintenance and understand compliance standards like **IEC60601-1** and **IEC62353**, ensuring all systems operate efficiently and safely. My background includes developing solutions that enhance customer service through effective communication and analytical reasoning.

In addition to my core expertise, I leverage my full-stack development skills in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to create and enhance software solutions. My experience extends across the healthcare and financial sectors, crafting enterprise-grade applications using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have deep cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**, leading initiatives that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. Furthermore, I’m proficient in **CI/CD** automation, microservices architecture, and have hands-on experience with MLOps workflows employing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
